tests.test_description: The autonomy of the device is tested in extremely cold conditions to ensure it can least at least 7 days.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Put the development board in a plastic bag.
Empty the air from the bag and close it.
Put the bag in the freezer for 2 hours.
Take the development board out of the freezer and plug it to the GitHub Actions host computer
Check the console to see the percentage of battery left and enter it in the Python script to know if SportShield would last one week.

tests.test_description: The autonomy of the device is tested in normal temperature conditions to ensure it can least at least 7 days.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Leave the development board in a room at room temperature for 2 hours.
Plug back the development board to the GitHub Actions host computer.
Check the console to see the percentage of battery left and enter it in the Python script to know if SportShield would last one week.

tests.test_name: Deep sleep mode disabled while charging

tests.test_description: If the anti-theft device hits 5% of the battery level, deep sleep mode should be enabled.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Plug the development board to the GitHub Actions host computer and check the battery level.
If the battery level is greater than 5%, wait until the battery level is less than 5% by unplugging it from the computer.
If the battery level is lower than 5%, unplug the board from the computer and start moving it.
Verify on your phone a notification has been sent and that no alarm has been triggered by the device.

tests.test_description: The Bluetooth has a field to enable directly the deep sleep mode from the app.

steps_to_follow.step_description: On SportShield, find the device named 'SportShield 5'.
Log in to the board and find the deep sleep mode field.
Send the hexadecimal value 0x1
Move the board in multiple directions for 30 seconds.
Verify on your phone a notification has not been sent and that no alarm has been triggered by the device.

tests.test_description: The alarm is disabled when the deep sleep mode is enabled.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Ensure that deep sleep mode is enabled.
